channel.title: Bob Odenkirk on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: After Crediting ‘Nobody’ Workouts for Saving His Life, Bob Odenkirk “Never Stopped Training” for Sequel
item.description: The star, who said he survived a 2021 heart attack because of his prep for the action film, is back for ‘Nobody 2’ alongside new addition Sharon Stone.

item.title: Bob Odenkirk’s Action Pic ‘Normal,’ Bryan Fuller’s ‘Dust Bunny’ Join Toronto Film Fest Lineup
